basics.name: Shreyans Jain
basics.label: Data Scientist/ML Researcher
basics.summary: Self Taught Data Scientist with 8 years of Applied ML work ex, trying to make it into AI safety and interpretability research.

work.name: GEP Worldwide
work.summary: Leading a P2P Pod including multiple products (Invoices OCR, Search, Requisition, Catalog) involving end-to-end product lifecycle management, engineering, software architecture design, machine learning, deployment, product roadmap design & people management which serves lakhs of users per day.
highlights: Custom OCR Invoice Extractor supporting more than 100k invoice formats
Entity & Intent Detection using prompt engineering on GPT-3.5 models
Powering the global Item catalog, Category & Supplier Search across the whole platform

work.name: Bookmyshow
work.summary: Contributing to all things ML for Bookmyshow, including building a real time recommender system from scratch, dyanamic pricing solutions and User Engagement Solutions.
highlights: Created the Next-Gen Real Time Centralized Personalization System which captured the Affinity (GLoVe),Collaborative (ALS), Content Similarity (Doc2Vec) and Exploration (Reinforcement Learning) aspects
Automated Dynamic Pricing Algorithm for Live events and movies
Created & Deployed an Engagement Score Metric to quantify and measure the ongoing User Engagement on the platform

work.name: Hotstar
highlights: Created a Churn Prediction Model for our Cricket user base
Created a User Segmentation Model of our customer base
Created an Email Categorization Model to assist the Customer Support Team

work.name: Fractal.ai
highlights: Leading a Inventory Management Solution for Fortune 500 CPG company, involving forecasting, dashboarding and team management
Created a Text Mining Model to automate the product mapping procedure
Created a Recommender System using Collaborative Filtering for a Major CPG Company
Contributed to misc features in the Minari Package
Contributed to the integration of Minari with CleanRL

projects.name: Visualize Training
projects.summary: Package for creating visualizations for the Training Dynamics of a Neural Network.
highlights: Package Creation for Visualizing Training Dynamics
Experiments on Attention rate as a hyperparameter for Generalization Strategies
